missedpages: Title for the link to Special:MissedPages on Special:SpecialPages.
missedpages-count: Column header on Special:MissedPages for the column that contains the hit counts for pages.
missedpages-page: Column header on Special:MissedPages for the column that contains the links to the pages.
missedpages-actions: Column header on Special:MissedPages for the column that contains the action buttons etc.
missedpages-redirect: Button label for the button next to the text input in which the redirect target is entered.
missedpages-redirect-comment: Edit comment used when creating a redirect page.
missedpages-delete: Button label for the button to delete one page's log entries.
missedpages-ignore: Button label for the button to ignore one page and no longer add it to the log.
